name: EduCate - Part 1
description:
How far would you go to train someone? Would you let them die? EduCate is a 3 part game about a mother cat educating a kitten. The first part of EduCate is free for everyone.

Yes this game needs some practice to play and i highly suggest you finish the game at least once.

This game is my first game and my learning project. The reason game is short because other parts are going to be interactive with each other and when all parts are completed, the full game will be released for you to play.
